title: Founder & CEO
text: Built and maintain a multi-tenant SaaS web app for real-time inventory lookup via barcode/QR scanning. Led full-stack development (React, Firebase, Supabase), implemented analytics dashboards, authentication, and CRM integration. Oversee architecture, performance, and client onboarding.
